Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 56th overall pick, by Houston in 2010...
Traded from Houston to St. Louis on 4/15/2010 (Going to STL: P J. Gast. Going to HOU: 1B J. Bishop)...
Injured on 5/1/2010 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/29/2010 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/5/2012 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 4/24/2013 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/12/2014...
Had first career hit on 8/17/2015, off Justin Duchscherer (ARI)...
Injured on 7/21/2017 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Milwaukee on 6/16/2018 (Going to MIL: P J. Gast. Going to STL: P J. Abrams)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/16/2019, off Thomas Stayton (STL)...
Injured on 7/21/2019 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Pitched NO-HITTER against New York (N) on 8/20/2019, striking out 6...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/2/2023 to a 4-year deal worth $2,020,000 per year...
